attributes.action: Recognise the harm to the town of Keynsham and the loss of jobs that the closure of the Cadbury Factory in the town will do to the local economy and employment situation. Having so recognised take steps to work with Cadbury Trebor Bassett to stop the closure and retain both the jobs and chocolate production in Keynsham and not to transfer same to Poland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently Cadbury Trebor Bassett has announced the closure of its Somerdale factory in Keynsham near Bristol with the loss of some 500 jobs over the next couple of years. The factory is to be moved to Poland.
The factory has been part of Keynsham's history and way of life for some 70 plus years and has a direct link with the history of chocolate making in Bristol. 
The site has historical interest and the factory is iconic to the town. The main thrust has to be the retention of a vibrant and working factory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
